item.title: The Influence of Coach Greg Doucette: A Humble Realization in My Fitness Journey
item.author: Zhu Yufan
item.description: Striking the Balance: Cardiovascular and Strength Training in My Fitness Journey 💪🚴‍♂️ In my pursuit of fitness, I’ve discovered a transformative realization that has become the cornerstone of my journey: the importance of striking the perfect balance between cardiovascular and strength training. A Focused Pursuit As a dedicated fitness enthusiast, I initially immersed myself in rigorous strength training, eager to see visible results. While this approach yielded satisfying outcomes, it inadvertently overshadowed the significance of cardiovascular exercises for overall well-being.
